academic_info.description: Questions about academic programs, courses, and requirements
examples: What programs are offered in the Computer Science department?
Tell me about the Engineering program
What are the requirements for the Business major?

registration.description: Questions about course registration, deadlines, and processes
examples: When is the registration deadline for fall semester?
How do I register for classes?
What's the add/drop deadline?

financial_aid.description: Questions about financial aid, scholarships, and tuition
examples: How do I apply for financial aid?
What scholarships are available?
When is tuition due?

campus_location.description: Questions about building locations and campus navigation
examples: Where is the library?
How do I get to the Student Center?
What building is the Computer Science department in?

faculty_info.description: Questions about faculty members and their information
examples: Who is the chair of the Computer Science department?
What are Professor Smith's office hours?
How can I contact my advisor?

events.description: Questions about campus events and activities
examples: What events are happening this week?
When is the career fair?
Are there any student organization meetings today?
Where is the counseling center?
How do I schedule a tutoring session?
What services does the career center offer?

housing.description: Questions about on-campus housing and residence life
examples: How do I apply for on-campus housing?
What are the residence hall options?
When is the housing application deadline?
